import { Select } from "@material-ui/core" import { Add, Remove } from "@material-ui/icons" import styled from "styled-components" import Announcement from "../components/Announcement" import Footer from "../components/Footer" import Navbar from "../components/Navbar" import Newsletter from "../components/Newsletter" const Container = styled.div` ` const Wrapper = styled.div` padding:50px; display:flex; ` const ImgContainer = styled.div` flex:1; ` const Image = styled.img` height:90vh; width:100%; object-fit:cover; ` const InfoContainer = styled.div` flex:1; padding: 0 50px; ` const Title = styled.h2` ` const Desc = styled.p` margin:20px 0; ` const Price = styled.p` font-weight:300; font-size:40px; ` const FilterContainer = styled.div` width:50%; display:flex; justify-content:space-between; margin:30px 0px; ` const Filter = styled.div` display:flex; align-items:center; ` const FilterTitle = styled.span` font-size:20px; font-weight:300; ` const FilterColor = styled.div` width:20px; height:20px; border-radius:50%; background-color: ${props => props.color}; margin:0px 5px; cursor:pointer; ` const FilterSize = styled.select` margin-left:10px; padding:5px; ` const FilterSizeOption = styled.option` ` const AddContainer = styled.div` ` const AmountContainer = styled.div` ` const Amount = styled.span` ` const Button = styled.button` ` const Product = () => { return (
Denim Blue Jeans A very nice Jeans with blue color all over it alongwith white patches that increases the style of this jeans more.lorem ipsum hello done go for it you know what time it is.White patches that increases the style of this jeans more.lorem ipsum hello done go for it you know what time it is. $20 Color Size XS S M L XL 1
) } export default Product
